msbt.message: You don't look familiar You must be visiting from somewhere else!Don't you think this island is like a dream? I hope you enjoy your time here, .
It's a pleasure to see you again! Though maybe We haven't met before, have we. Oh, ! Sorry about that. I just woke up from the most marvelous dream, and I'm still getting my bearings.
I don't think we've met before! How wonderful! I love seeing new faces here on . I hope you enjoy yourself during your stay. Maybe we'll run into each other again, .

What a lovely surprise, running into you like this, .I had a dream the other night where something very similar happened. Isn't that strange, ! You were returning my copy of .Let me know if you ever want to borrow it for real. If I remember correctly, in my dream you liked it.
Talk about coincidence! Seeing you here is so serendipitous! I can barely believe it's real, .
! Is it really you?Oh, of course it is! You know, your being here just proves that wishing on a star actually works sometimes.
Well, if it isn't .I never would have dreamed of running into you here, but I'm delighted that I did, .
This is an unexpected treat! I hope you don't mind me saying this, but you look a little sleepy.
Here I was thinking I was in a dream, but if you're herethis must be reality,
Have you had a chance to see the rest of the island yet, ?There are all sorts of nooks and crannies to discover, so don't be afraid to take your time.

In literature, dreams are sometimes seen as premonitions, or a way to glimpse the future. Well, I'm glad that's not how things actually work.I'm getting anxious just thinking about all those tests I'd forget to study for, !
Even if this is all a dream, I'm so glad we had the chance to meet here today, .
I've always wondered what you would be like as a travel partner.This is such a perfect opportunity to see you in vacation mode.
It's so fortuitous that we get to enjoy this extra time together. We've got to make the most of it, !
Even if this is just a dream, I'm happy I get to share it with you.Wouldn't it be great if folks got to dream together more often?
